title: Inox Wind has all building blocks in place: Devansh Jain, Executive director, InoxGFL Group
description: Inox Wind reported its first profit in six years for the April-June period, driven by India's push for renewable energy. The company has a 2.9GW order book and net debt zero status. It's looking at future growth, buoyed by government targets and increasing demand for wind energy.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
